frame.name: Evoking
frame.definition:
<def-root>Some <fen>Stimulus</fen> causes a <fen>Cognizer</fen> to think of a prior <fen>Phenomenon</fen> due to its perceived similarity.
<ex>I burned down the malt shop where we used to go just because <fex name="Stim">it</fex> <t>reminds</t> me <fex name="Phen">of you</fex></ex>
</def-root>

FE.name: Cognizer
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Cognizer</fen> is the person who remembers the <fen>Phenomenon</fen> .</def-root>

FE.name: Phenomenon
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Phenomenon</fen> is the mental content that a <fen>Cognizer</fen> remembers.
<ex>You <t>remind</t> me <fex name="Phen">of my uncle Jerry</fex></ex></def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root><fen>Degree</fen> to which <fen>Cognizer</fen> perceives the <fen>Stimulus</fen> to match the <fen>Phenomenon</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition: <def-root>Any description of the event which is not covered by more specific FEs, including speed (quickly) and general descriptions comparing events (the same way). Other expressions involving how the experience affects the <fen>Cognizer</fen> may also be expressed (painfully).</def-root>

FE.name: Duration
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Duration</fen> is the amount of time for which the <fen>Stimulus</fen> continues to remind the Cognizer of the <fen>Phenomenon</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fex name="Explanation">Explanation</fex> for which the <fen>Stimulus</fen> evokes the <fen>Phenomenon</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Time</fen> is when the Cognizer remembers the <fen>Phenomenon</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Stimulus
FE.definition:
<def-root>The entity or situation that causes the <fen>Cognizer</fen> to think of the <fen>Phenomenon</fen>.
<ex> <fex name="Stimulus">Internationalization</fex> <t>conjures</t> up a world of diplomatic exchanges and international agencies in which the interests of ex-colonial and great powers still linger</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Feature
FE.definition:
<def-root>A characteristic of the <fen>Stimulus</fen> that contributes to the perception of similarity to the <fen>Phenomenon</fen>.
<ex>She <t>reminds</t> me of your mother <fex name="fea">with her darting beady eyes</fex>.</ex></def-root>
